ygData.subject: Re: Attack the Trainers
ygData.msgSnippet: There are no Trainers outside the base, Ignatius and Zoe are inside preying to whatever gods will listen that the Preds won t get in while they re short

There are no Trainers outside the base, Ignatius and Zoe are inside preying
to whatever gods will listen that the Preds won't get in while they're short
handed.

You are here   \/

                        In a small gap between the sand and the Trainer base
Cygnars shots strike the side of the base causing dents to form. Ignatius
detects the damage but doesn't have any defenses capable of getting beneath
the ship. "Close all blast doors on the lower level and arm internal
defenses to repel anyone who you don't recognize."

Quickly more shots struck the side. stress cracks were beginning to form.
The three bots at the side were causing havoc to the superstructure of the
Trainer base.(Cygnar Drillbit, and Killfest)

two mini gattling guns lower from the ceiling taking aim and begin fireing
at Zoe, She had been welcomed by Slayer and Ignatius but hadn't been
identified by Prebon or Blaze. In the computers eye that made her no more
recognized than the attackers.

Meanwhile the auto defenses outside continue fireing at the Destrocons.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2001 5:52 PM
Subject: Re: Attack the Trainers


> ::Cygnar::
>     He sprints through the tunnel checking his weapon.  Upon reaching the
> other side of the tunnel within the Trainer's shield perimeter he views
the
> enormous ship in the sky above him.  Unconcerned he opens fire at the
nearest
> Trainer.
